name: Poker Warrior
description:
The poker warrior is on a new quest - to save the princess! 

Continue into the depths of the dungeon as you battle enemies and collect items on the way that will aid you in your journey to save the princess.

How to play:

WASD to move when out of battle.

In battle:

You will have a hand of cards at the bottom. Select up to 5 cards and press the sword button in the middle of the screen to start your attack! Each card will cost mana depending on their value e.g. A = 1, 2 = 2, K = 13 etc.

Red Suited cards will give you Armor/BLK which will protect you from enemy attacks for the next turn. Black suited cards will dish out the hurt.

Make combinations to increase your damage/blocking potential!

Combinations:

Pair - 2x of the same value card

Three of a kind - 3x of the same value card

Four of a kind - 4x of the same value card

Straight - 5x cards that are linked consecutively in a row

Flush - 5x cards of the same suit

Full House - 3x of the same value card + 2x of the same value card

Straight Flush - Straight and a flush combined

Royal Straight Flush - A straight flush that goes from 10-A

There are still bugs in this game and it is not in optimal shape as this was made for a game jam and my time was short. Will work on it further if it gets enough support.

Extra instructions: Click on the textbox to go to next dialogue.

Thanks for playing!
